resources.string: The Burger Stand is known to provide everyone with mouth watering burger and sandwiches. We offer basic cheese sandwiches to our very favorite triple bacon, egg, sausage jumbo sandwich. Come and enjoy a meal at the Burger Stand and we promise you will not be disappointed.\nWith the help of the donation you provide to us, we are able to offer food to EVERYONE. So help us out so we can help each other to make the world a better place! \n

"Weaver's, like the name says, ensures that you get to spend a warm, toasty winter. Our collection of sweaters, gloves and scarves will stop you from turning into a snowman! So do come and check our winter collection.\nIf you donate to our local business, we will be able to ensure that NO ONE has to turn into a snowman this winter. So join us in building a WARM WINTER\n
